.. _community.windows.win_certificate_info_module:


**************************************
community.windows.win_certificate_info
**************************************

**Get information on certificates from a Windows Certificate Store**



.. contents::
   :local:
   :depth: 1


Synopsis
--------
- Returns information about certificates in a Windows Certificate Store.




Parameters
----------

.. raw:: html

    <table  border=0 cellpadding=0 class="documentation-table">
        <tr>
            <th colspan="1">Parameter</th>
            <th>Choices/<font color="blue">Defaults</font></th>
            <th width="100%">Comments</th>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-"></div>
                    <b>store_location</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>
                        <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                    <li>CurrentUser</li>
                                    <li><div style="color: blue"><b>LocalMachine</b>&nbsp;&larr;</div></li>
                        </ul>
                </td>
                <td>
                        <div>The location of the store to search.</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-"></div>
                    <b>store_name</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>
                        <b>Default:</b><br/><div style="color: blue">"My"</div>
                </td>
                <td>
                        <div>The name of the store to search.</div>
                        <div>See <a href='https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.security.cryptography.x509certificates.storename'>https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.security.cryptography.x509certificates.storename</a> for a list of built-in store names.</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-"></div>
                    <b>thumbprint</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>
                </td>
                <td>
                        <div>The thumbprint as a hex string of a certificate to find.</div>
                        <div>When specified, filters the <em>certificates</em> return value to a single certificate</div>
                        <div>See the examples for how to format the thumbprint.</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
    </table>
    <br/>



See Also
--------

.. seealso::

   :ref:`ansible.windows.win_certificate_store_module`
      The official documentation on the **ansible.windows.win_certificate_store** module.


Examples
--------

.. code-block:: yaml

    - name: Obtain information about a particular certificate in the computer's personal store
      community.windows.win_certificate_info:
        thumbprint: BD7AF104CF1872BDB518D95C9534EA941665FD27
      register: mycert

    # thumbprint can also be lower case
    - name: Obtain information about a particular certificate in the computer's personal store
      community.windows.win_certificate_info:
        thumbprint: bd7af104cf1872bdb518d95c9534ea941665fd27
      register: mycert

    - name: Obtain information about all certificates in the root store
      community.windows.win_certificate_info:
        store_name: Root
      register: ca

    # Import a pfx and then get information on the certificates
    - name: Import pfx certificate that is password protected
      ansible.windows.win_certificate_store:
        path: C:\Temp\cert.pfx
        state: present
        password: VeryStrongPasswordHere!
      become: yes
      become_method: runas
      register: mycert

    - name: Obtain information on each certificate that was touched
      community.windows.win_certificate_info:
        thumbprint: "{{ item }}"
      register: mycert_stats
      loop: "{{ mycert.thumbprints }}"



Return Values
-------------
Common return values are documented `here <https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/reference_appendices/common_return_values.html#common-return-values>`_, the following are the fields unique to this module:

.. raw:: html

    <table border=0 cellpadding=0 class="documentation-table">
        <tr>
            <th colspan="2">Key</th>
            <th>Returned</th>
            <th width="100%">Description</th>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>certificates</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                       / <span style="color: purple">elements=dictionary</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>success</td>
                <td>
                            <div>A list of information about certificates found in the store, sorted by thumbprint.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>archived</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Indicates that the certificate is archived.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>cert_data</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The base64 encoded data of the entire certificate.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>dns_names</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                       / <span style="color: purple">elements=string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Lists the registered dns names for the certificate.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">[&#x27;*.m.wikiquote.org&#x27;, &#x27;*.wikipedia.org&#x27;]</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>extensions</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                       / <span style="color: purple">elements=dictionary</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The collection of the certificates extensions.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">[{&#x27;critical&#x27;: False, &#x27;field&#x27;: &#x27;Subject Key Identifier&#x27;, &#x27;value&#x27;: &#x27;88 27 17 09 a9 b6 18 60 8b ec eb ba f6 47 59 c5 52 54 a3 b7&#x27;}, {&#x27;critical&#x27;: True, &#x27;field&#x27;: &#x27;Basic Constraints&#x27;, &#x27;value&#x27;: &#x27;Subject Type=CA, Path Length Constraint=None&#x27;}, {&#x27;critical&#x27;: False, &#x27;field&#x27;: &#x27;Authority Key Identifier&#x27;, &#x27;value&#x27;: &#x27;KeyID=2b d0 69 47 94 76 09 fe f4 6b 8d 2e 40 a6 f7 47 4d 7f 08 5e&#x27;}, {&#x27;critical&#x27;: False, &#x27;field&#x27;: &#x27;CRL Distribution Points&#x27;, &#x27;value&#x27;: &#x27;[1]CRL Distribution Point: Distribution Point Name:Full Name:URL=http://crl.apple.com/root.crl&#x27;}, {&#x27;critical&#x27;: True, &#x27;field&#x27;: &#x27;Key Usage&#x27;, &#x27;value&#x27;: &#x27;Digital Signature, Certificate Signing, Off-line CRL Signing, CRL Signing (86)&#x27;}, {&#x27;critical&#x27;: False, &#x27;field&#x27;: None, &#x27;value&#x27;: &#x27;05 00&#x27;}]</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>friendly_name</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The associated alias for the certificate.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">Microsoft Root Authority</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>has_private_key</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>Indicates that the certificate contains a private key.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>intended_purposes</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>enhanced key usages extension exists.</td>
                <td>
                            <div>lists the intended applications for the certificate.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">[&#x27;Server Authentication&#x27;]</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>is_ca</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>basic constraints extension exists.</td>
                <td>
                            <div>Indicates that the certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">True</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>issued_by</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The certificate issuer&#x27;s common name.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">Apple Root CA</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>issued_to</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The certificate&#x27;s common name.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">Apple Worldwide Developer Relations Certification Authority</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>issuer</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The certificate issuer&#x27;s distinguished name.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">CN=Apple Root CA, OU=Apple Certification Authority, O=Apple Inc., C=US</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>key_usages</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                       / <span style="color: purple">elements=string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>key usages extension exists.</td>
                <td>
                            <div>Defines how the certificate key can be used.</div>
                            <div>If this value is not defined, the key can be used for any purpose.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">[&#x27;CrlSign&#x27;, &#x27;KeyCertSign&#x27;, &#x27;DigitalSignature&#x27;]</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>path_length_constraint</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>basic constraints extension exists</td>
                <td>
                            <div>The number of levels allowed in a certificates path.</div>
                            <div>If this value is 0, the certificate does not have a restriction.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>public_key</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The base64 encoded public key of the certificate.</div>
                    <br/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>serial_number</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The serial number of the certificate represented as a hexadecimal string</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">01DEBCC4396DA010</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>signature_algorithm</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The algorithm used to create the certificate&#x27;s signature</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">sha1RSA</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>ski</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>subject key identifier extension exists.</td>
                <td>
                            <div>The certificate&#x27;s subject key identifier</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">88271709A9B618608BECEBBAF64759C55254A3B7</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>subject</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The certificate&#x27;s distinguished name.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">CN=Apple Worldwide Developer Relations Certification Authority, OU=Apple Worldwide Developer Relations, O=Apple Inc., C=US</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>thumbprint</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The thumbprint as a hex string of the certificate.</div>
                            <div>The return format will always be upper case.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">FF6797793A3CD798DC5B2ABEF56F73EDC9F83A64</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>valid_from</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">float</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The start date of the certificate represented in seconds since epoch.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">1360255727</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>valid_from_iso8601</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The start date of the certificate represented as an iso8601 formatted date.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">2017-12-15T08:39:32Z</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>valid_to</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">float</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The expiry date of the certificate represented in seconds since epoch.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">1675788527</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>valid_to_iso8601</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The expiry date of the certificate represented as an iso8601 formatted date.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">2086-01-02T08:39:32Z</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>version</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td></td>
                <td>
                            <div>The x509 format version of the certificate</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">3</div>
                </td>
            </tr>

            <tr>
                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-"></div>
                    <b>exists</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td>success</td>
                <td>
                            <div>Whether any certificates were found in the store.</div>
                            <div>When <em>thumbprint</em> is specified, returns true only if the certificate mathing the thumbprint exists.</div>
                    <br/>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                        <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">True</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
    </table>
    <br/><br/>
